parameters.content:
## 2. Auto Trigger
Schedule (15min) + Webhook to start pipeline

## Script Generation
Grok 4.1 creates viral script

## Get Video
Pexels B-roll search & download

## Create Voice
ElevenLabs TTS + duration check

## Create Avatar
HeyGen lip-sync video generation

## Combine Videos + Music
FFmpeg chromakey compositing
